mapper.select: SELECT S.姓名 as staffName, S.人员编码 as staffCode, P.性别 as gender, P.出生日期 as dataBirth, P.籍贯省份 as province, U.学校 as school, P.学历 as Record, B.内容 as content, B.类型 as type, P.到职日期 as date, S.事业部 as division, S.部门 as department, S.岗位 as jobs, S.职称 as title, P.QQ as QQ, C.手机号码 as mobilePhone, D.分机号码 as extensionNum, D.企业QQ as enterpriseQQ, E.微信号 as WeChatID from PUBLICDATA.dbo.DS_STAFF S left join HRM.dbo.[PMStaffRecord] p ON S.人员编码=P.人员编码 left JOIN HRM.dbo.PMGraduateUniversity U ON S.人员编码=U.人员编码 LEFT Join GSJCZDA.dbo.BasicInformation B ON S.人员编码=B.人员编码 left join HF.dbo.MobilePhoneNumberInformation c on S.人员编码=c.使用者人员编码 and c.类型 = '员工' left join DW.DBO.PI_Contact D ON S.人员编码 = D.人员编码 left join HF.DBO.MobilePhoneNumberInformation E ON S.人员编码 = E.使用者人员编码 WHERE S.人员编码='15110204'

SELECT 姓名 as staffName,协议编号 as contractNum,协议编号 as staffCode,协议类型 as contractType,到职日期 as startingData,签订日期 as signingDate,到期日期 as dueDate,contractDead=null FROM HRM.dbo.[PMAgreement] WHERE 人员编码=#{staffCode} UNION ALL SELECT 姓名,合同编号,人员编码,合同类型,到职时间 到职日期,签订日期,到期日期,合同期限 FROM HRM.dbo.[PMLaborContract] WHERE 人员编码=#{staffCode} order by 签订日期 desc
